meanings.definition: The surgical removal of the clitoris.
meanings.sent1: The doctor performed clitoridectomies on patients who needed the procedure.
meanings.sent2: Clitoridectomies are sometimes done for medical reasons.
meanings.sent3: During the surgery, the clitoridectomies made the patients feel better.
meanings.sent4: The removal of the clitoris was like a delicate dance of clitoridectomies.
meanings.sent5: The sharp tools used in clitoridectomies gleamed under the bright lights of the operating room.

meanings.definition: The act of performing a clitoridectomy.
meanings.sent1: Her expertise in clitoridectomies made her a sought-after surgeon.

meanings.sent3: The clitoridectomies performed by the medical team were precise and skillful.

meanings.sent5: The success rate of clitoridectomies at the clinic was impressive.

meanings.definition: The practice of culturally or religiously motivated removal of the clitoris.
meanings.sent1: In some communities, clitoridectomies are considered a tradition.
meanings.sent2: The debate around clitoridectomies continues in many societies.
meanings.sent3: The cultural significance of clitoridectomies is a topic of discussion worldwide.
